name: NyaaTorrents Streamlined
description:
Hides all ads on nyaa.eu and optimizes the layout for screen resolutions as low as 1024 x 600. Compatible with Firefox, Chrome, and Safari 5.

Note: If you're seeing missing download buttons, torrent category icons, etc. make sure you disable AdBlock on NyaaTorrents.
additional_info:
